actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to income tax returns by Members of Congress.

summary.text: Declares the sense of Congress that each Member of Congress must prepare his own income tax return without assistance until Congress eases the burden that "the complex and obtuse" tax laws place on taxpayers.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to income tax returns by Members of Congress.
